forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. South wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 68. South wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of thunderstorms and a slight chance of rain between 8pm and 9pm, then rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 41, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. South southwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Light Rain Likely then Chance Rain And Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 2pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 44. West wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a low around 34. Northeast wind around 15 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers after 11am. Cloudy. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 38 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.shortForecast: Rain And Snow Showers then Slight Chance Sleet
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 11pm, then rain and snow showers between 11pm and midnight, then rain and snow showers between midnight and 1am, then a slight chance of sleet and rain and snow showers between 1am and 4am, then snow showers and patchy blowing snow. Cloudy. Low around 26, with temperatures rising to around 31 overnight. North wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible

forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers and patchy blowing snow before 8am, then snow likely and patchy blowing snow between 8am and 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 33. North wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a low around 34. Northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers after 11am. Mostly cloudy. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 43 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 2am, then sleet and rain showers and a slight chance of freezing rain between 2am and 4am, then snow showers and a slight chance of freezing rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 26, with temperatures rising to around 31 overnight. Northeast wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: It’s still great! New groom this morning over a strong base with fresh snow . The upper loops have great coverage : both the skate and classic are premium .

nubsNob.xcTrails: The upper trails were power-tilled and tracked on Monday. Expect soft snow today. The upper red is holding snow better compared to the rest of the trails.
nubsNob.comments: It's a spring ski day with the temperature above freezing all day. The snow surface is transformed loose granular snow with plenty of moisture. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The Tune Center is now selling the demo skis from this season and we have some amazing deals in the General Store. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
